title: SMC_MoveAdditionalAxesRelative (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL SMC_MoveAdditionalAxesRelative IMPLEMENTS IAdditionalAxesMovement
If this function block is assigned to the
AdditionalAxes
input of one of the movement
function blocks
MC_MoveDirectAbsolute
,
MC_MoveDirectRelative
,
MC_MoveLinearAbsolute
,
MC_MoveLinearRelative
,
MC_MoveCircularAbsolute
, or
|
MC_MoveCircularRelative, the additional
axes of the axis group will travel the commanded
Distances
while the movement function block is
Active
.
The movement of the additional axes is synchronized with the movement of the movement function block.
